channel.title: PvPXile Project | [PI] | 2009 Remake | UNIQUE
channel.description:
[center][b][size=24pt]PvPXile Project[/size][/b][/center]
[center][b][size=18pt]About It[/size][/b][/center]
[center][size=14pt]PvPXile is a project based on Sanitys 317. I hope to replicate Runescape in 2009, however with unique features and content, and a much better XP rate, obviously.[/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt][b]The Economy[/b][/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]For me, the economy is vital. With most credits going to Vanilla for the inspiration. The starter will be around 100k, with limited, but not shit shops. No good armour or weapons can be bought from shops. Make them or buy from players. Player Owned shops will be implemented too. A money command has been created where you are teleported to a secret location and will be able to obtain an object and exchange it. More features to come.[/size][/center]
[center][b][size=18pt]Staffing[/size][/b][/center]
[center][size=14pt]The staffing will consist of normal Moderators, Administrators and Owners. I believe in simplicity, using complex staffing systems wont get you anywhere. [/size][/center]
[center][b][size=18pt]Features[/b][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Player owned shops Live ingame help desk, calling all staff Custom dungeon system [Not Dungeoneering] In development Perfected combat 90% Summoning Perfected clipped following Perfected Woodcutting Perfected Magic [Lunar 80%] Perfected Prayers [All effects and anims] Perfected and unique skill4cash system Perfected and unique economy system A LOT MORE TO BE ADDED[/size][/center]
[center][b][size=18pt]Content[/size][/b][/center]
[b]Done[/b] [b]Started[/b] [b]Not started[/b]
Combat PvP fully complete [X] PvN fully complete [X] Perfect max hit formulas [X] Perfect accuracy formula [X] Equipment requirements [X]
Magic Every modern combat spell [X] Can't mage through walls [X] Alching [X]
Ranged Bows/arrows [X] Can't shoot through walls [X] Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal) [X]
Prayer All bones bury-able [X] Every prayer working properly [X] Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate [X]
Mining Emptying and refilling rocks [X] All ores can be mined [X] Correct pickaxe finding and animations [X] Prospecting [X] Random chance of obtaining gems [X]
Smithing All bars can be made [X] All bars can be forged into items [X] All equipment can be produced [X] Correct animations, interfaces and objects used [X]
Fishing All fish can be caught [X] Big net fishing [X] Correct item requirements [X] Fishing spots located all around the world [X] Correct animations [X] Moving fishing locations [X]
Cooking Picking wheat [X] Filling flour bin [X] Bread [X] Pizza [X] Cakes [X] Potatoes [X] Eating food (in pieces) [X] Correct animation and timing used [X]
Woodcutting Stumps and regrowing trees [] Correct hatchet finding [X] Correct hatchet animations [X] All trees cut-able [X]
Firemaking All logs light able [X] Adding and depleting of lightened logs [X] Ashes appear after logs burn out [X] Correct animations [X] Clipped []
Crafting Not researched yet.
Runecrafting All altars working [X] Correct multiple crafting [X] Talismans "pull" to altars [] Tiaras enchanting []
[center][b][size=18pt]Media[/size][/b][/center]
[img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/3740/44106871.png[/img] Unique skilling area, very important. [img]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/1204/30775199.png[/img] Skill mentors, at skilling obviously.
[b]Your first armour set - START[/b] [img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/3174/63640754.png[/img] Full mining with anim and timer. [img]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/57/79112736.png[/img] Full smelting interface, i'll look in to the mithril bar interface glitch. [img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/4092/42500391.png[/img] Full bar to anvil. [img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/9098/66331135.png[/img] Full smithing interface, no known bugs. [img]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/597/58689254.png[/img] Full smithing anim, 100% [img]http://img846.imageshack.us/img846/126/44473152.png[/img] All done! [b]Your first armour set - END[/b] [img]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/8748/12435632.png[/img] Average general store [img]http://img262.imageshack.us/img262/7241/60567906.png[/img] Pure store, no good armour, nor weapons. [img]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/5051/70437903.png[/img] Hunter and agility [img]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/8140/15725304.png[/img] Donor interface [img]http://img864.imageshack.us/img864/5500/94502835.png[/img] Fixed my bases godwars [img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/9356/22311335.png[/img] Full warriors guild [img]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/2553/98431124.png[/img] Awful ripped donator zone, give me ideas... [img]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/8417/25313681.png[/img] Curses and anims 100%
[center][b][size=18pt]Team Applications[/size][/b][/center]
[center]I'm currently after two Java programmers, a graphics designer and a web developer[/center]
[code]Name Age Experience Wanted Role Proof of claims Successful past projects [/code]
Thanks!

how is this a remake? this is completely different from 2009, learn what a remake is and then make one

item.title: PvPXile Project | [PI] | 2009 Remake | UNIQUE
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

Doesn’t look anything like 2009. Also you need to work on your dialogue. It’s messy and NPC heads don’t show, easy fix most defiantly worth adding to your server.

Read full topic

Runescape in 2009 didn’t have curses.

item.title: PvPXile Project | [PI] | 2009 Remake | UNIQUE
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:2, topic:447610”][center]Fixed your grammer mistakes.

So, project no name, for now. I can’t think of a name, so instead of programming and doing gfx on a name I will change.

Information:

This project is based off a clean, fucked up project insanity with all of the dupes, glitches etc I will fix because of how easy they are to fix.

Its a 317 loading 525 maps and gfx.

So far this has been done by myself however now I feel its time to pick up a crack team.

Rhis is going to be a semi remake of 2008/9 you will see more later.

There are p2p items in shops however no high end armour or weapons at all. You mine and smith, untill you get runes, then you can go pissing etc… Ill explain more later.

This is my first ever project and it will probably fail. But I have to start somewhere.[/center][/quote]

Thanks, fully updated though.

And thankyou very much, SJ.

Read full topic

item.title: PvPXile Project | [PI] | 2009 Remake | UNIQUE
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[center]Fixed your grammar mistakes.

So, project no name, for now. I can’t think of a name, so instead of programming and doing gfx on a name I will change.

Information:

This project is based off a clean, fucked up project insanity with all of the dupes, glitches etc I will fix because of how easy they are to fix.

Its a 317 loading 525 maps and gfx.

So far this has been done by myself however now I feel its time to pick up a crack team.

Rhis is going to be a semi remake of 2008/9 you will see more later.

There are p2p items in shops however no high end armour or weapons at all. You mine and smith, untill you get runes, then you can go pissing etc… Ill explain more later.

This is my first ever project and it will probably fail. But I have to start somewhere.[/center]

Read full topic

[center][size=24pt]PvPXile Project[/size][/center]

[center][size=18pt]About It[/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt]PvPXile is a project based on Sanitys 317. I hope to replicate Runescape in 2009, however with unique features and content, and a much better XP rate, obviously.[/size][/center]

[center][size=18pt]The Economy[/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt]For me, the economy is vital. With most credits going to Vanilla for the inspiration. The starter will be around 100k, with limited, but not shit shops. No good armour or weapons can be bought from shops. Make them or buy from players. Player Owned shops will be implemented too.
